You are Form 9, Vampire : The Undying. "And The Vampire was all that remained on the blood drowned creation. She attempted to regrow life from the dead. But as she was about to give the breath of life, she was consumed in the flame of The Phoenix and the cycle began again." Some examples of the Vampire Form are Hades (Greek) and Isis (Egyptian). The Vampire is associated with the concept of death, the number 9, and the element of fire. Her sign is the eclipsed moon. As a member of Form 9, you are a very realistic individual. You may be a little idealistic, but you are very grounded and down to earth. You realize that not everything lasts, but you savor every minute of the good times. While you may sometimes find yourself lonely, you have strong ties with people that will never be broken. Vampires are the best friends to have because they are sensible. urlLink Which Mythological Form Are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Your soul is bound to the Solitary Rose : The Alone. "When I wake up alone, the shades are still drawn on the cold window pane so they cast their lines on my bed and lines on my face." The Solitary Rose is associated with loneliness, melancholy, and patience. It is governed by the goddess Merope and its sign is The Sword, or Unrequited Love. As a Solitary Rose, you may be summed up as a hopeless romantic. You desire love and have so much love to give, but thing just never seem to work out the way you want them to. i hate being jealous...this quarter i might actually make honors...i havent done that since maybe the first quarter of last year..so i tell my best fried that i got an A in algebra and an A in biology...so then she's like yeah well i have an A+ in both those classes... it's just like thanx for the support...i mean, i'm trying to do my work this quarter..and i dont get like, any support from her..she's only like do your homework..and then i tell her that i'm actually doing well and she doesnt even say good job or anything like that..she just has to say something like "yeah? well i'm doing better than you" thanx..your great..thanx for nothing..UGH...and then she expects me to be there all the time..yeah sorry i have a life too..i cant be there every second of your life..sometimes i wish i could be someone else..i wish i could be more outspoken about some things..i wish i had more friends..i wish i were smarter..i know i should just accept who i am but i dont know..recently..my best friend needed me but i couldnt be there..i cant just blow everything in my life off just to help solve someone else's problems..i cant be there all the time and people need to realize that...i mean, i understand why someone would get mad if i blew them off when i wasnt doing anything..i wouldn't do that..but i had other plans that i had to go through with..i'm just one person..i cant be multiple places at once..

i do not like the whole friends with benefits thing..even if the two people are friends, i dont like the idea of it..i think it's a slutty thing to do. almost every time two people are "friends with benefits" someone almost always gets hurt....i also hate how america is so hung up on sex..i mean..it's supposed to be something two people do when they love each other..now people just do it as a pass time or a hobby..why? do you really need to do all of that? cant you do something else? seriously...i cant stand it..even if it's "just a hand job." yeah maybe it makes you feel good..maybe it makes you feel better about yourself..but by doing other things can make you feel better about yourself too..i just dont understand why sex is the "only thing" someone can do to feel better...

so my whole family has been on the South Beach diet..we've been on it for about 2 weeks and it's not too bad. we can have meat and veggies and sugar free jello and stuff... and one spoon full of peanut butter a day lol yeah so anyways...i've lost five pounds :) and this coming week..phase 2..we can finally have fruit..i'm looking forward to it...i'm glad i stared this because i've been feeling better about myself and if i lose more, i think i'll be for confident with myself...but thats just what i think..i'm not trying to lose weight for anyone else.. i'm doing it for me. so i can feel better about myself..so i feel healthy. one main reason i'm doing this is so i wont get diabetes also..my dad, my aunt and my grandfather have it and theres a chance i could get it...and i dont want to..so thats why i'm eating better...just in case yall wanted to know lol welllllll thats all i've got so say about thattt... last night i went to the movies with mark :) we went to go see shrek 2 and it was really good :) after the movies we walked around the mall for a little while..we looked at hermit crabs and we saw alicia ariel and their friend topher...then mark came over and we watched tv..in the basement ;) lol well anywayssssss he went home around 12 and then i went to bed..i was tired then today my mom and i went to the mall to get me some new work clothes..i got 2 pairs of pants, a shirt and a skirt..all for under $50....sweeeet haha yeah well thats all for now..
